attributes.action: Subject MPs expenses to independent audit and force repayment of illegitimate claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many MPs have been shown to be abusing the expenses system.  Each states that their claims are "within the rules".  Rules that they themselves have put in place that are blatantly inadequate.  Will the prime minister have the courage to take action against this abhorent practice that amounts to nothing more than fraudulent use of tax payers' money?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
